title: Rivian’s IPO Is Ultimate Validation of Tesla
itunes:title: Rivian’s IPO Is Ultimate Validation of Tesla
description:
Dr. Peter Antall, Chief Medical Officer at Brightline, shares his thoughts on vaccinating children against Covid. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Editor-in-Chief Emeritus Matt Winkler discuss why Rivian, a company with no sales, is worth $150 billion. Peter Atwater, Adjunct Professor of Economics at William & Mary, discusses the economic vulnerability Americans are experiencing. And We Drive to the Close with Alan Zafran, Co-CEO at IEQ Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
